document.full_text: the united states may release later on tuesday photos of osama bin laden's burial at sea, a u.s. official told reuters, in a move that might quieten speculation the al qaeda leader was not really killed in a u.s. raid on his pakistani compound.
document.title: u.s. may release photos of bin laden burial at sea
lines_and_colors: the united states may release later on tuesday photos of osama bin laden's burial at sea, a u.s. official told reuters, in a move that might quieten speculation the al qaeda leader was not really killed in a u.s. raid on his pakistani compound.
